definitions.definition: Any natural or synthetic compound, usually a steroid hormone , that stimulates or controls the development and maintenance of masculine characteristics in vertebrates . A male sex hormone such as testosterone or anabolic steroids .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , steroids ) Any natural or synthetic compound, usually a steroid hormone , that stimulates or controls the development and maintenance of masculine characteristics in vertebrates . A male sex hormone such as testosterone or anabolic steroids .
